title: For Sale : T200 1913 Fatima Cleveland Americans PSA 4.5
author: svtPONY95

posts.post_title: For Sale : T200 1913 Fatima Cleveland Americans PSA 4.5
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a 1913 T200 Fatima team card featuring the Cleveland Americans ( Naps ) including two of the greatest hitters of the era - Napoleon Lajoie and Shoeless Joe Jackson. I am asking SOLD for this beautiful PSA 4.5 , I prefer payment via friends and family. If interested please contact me via private message.


[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/svtPONY95/for-sale/74064/t200[/IMG]

Pm sent

I’d be interested in your other T200 also

Card is Sold !

Sent from my SM-A505U using Tapatalk
